name: RSVTestsForRSVByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: RSV (Tests for RSV by Culture and Identification Method)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of respiratory syncytial virus (RSV).),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: respiratory syncytial virus (RSV) culture; isolate),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
